title: What Trump said on wife Melania backing abortion rights in new memoir
content: Former President Donald Trump expressed support for Melania Trump's public declaration in her upcoming memoir, where she backs abortion rights, differing from his conservative stance. Trump emphasised the importance of sticking to one's convictions, while Melania advocates for individual freedom and a woman's right to control her body.
summary: Former President Donald Trump expressed support for Melania Trump's public declaration in her upcoming memoir, where she backs abortion rights, differing from his conservative stance. Trump emphasised the importance of sticking to one's convictions, while Melania advocates for individual freedom and a woman's right to control her body.

title: 'Will be there to ...': Elon Musk set to attend Trump’s rally at July assassination attempt site
content: Elon Musk has confirmed his attendance at Donald Trump’s upcoming Pennsylvania rally. Following a previous assassination attempt on Trump in Butler, the event will have heightened security measures. This rally aims to mobilize voters in the crucial swing state, amid a tight race with Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.
summary: Elon Musk has confirmed his attendance at Donald Trump’s upcoming Pennsylvania rally. Following a previous assassination attempt on Trump in Butler, the event will have heightened security measures. This rally aims to mobilize voters in the crucial swing state, amid a tight race with Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.

title: Was Jennifer Aniston secretly dating Barack Obama? Actress responds
content: Jennifer Aniston used her appearance on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ to humorously debunk tabloid rumors, including a false romance with Barack Obama and her unconventional beauty treatments. She also shared unique personal anecdotes, such as traveling with jars of olives and her therapist's ashes, and reflected on her childhood and family traditions.
summary: Jennifer Aniston used her appearance on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ to humorously debunk tabloid rumors, including a false romance with Barack Obama and her unconventional beauty treatments. She also shared unique personal anecdotes, such as traveling with jars of olives and her therapist's ashes, and reflected on her childhood and family traditions.

title: 'You bear responsibility of ...': Houthis warn shipowners in new phase of escalating Red Sea attacks
content: Greek shipping companies have been receiving serious threats from Yemen's Houthi militia regarding their vessels in the Red Sea. The Houthis, citing a transit ban violation involving an Israeli port, have warned of targeted attacks. These threats have caused significant route changes and elevated insurance rates, impacting international shipping and trade in the region.
summary: Greek shipping companies have been receiving serious threats from Yemen's Houthi militia regarding their vessels in the Red Sea. The Houthis, citing a transit ban violation involving an Israeli port, have warned of targeted attacks. These threats have caused significant route changes and elevated insurance rates, impacting international shipping and trade in the region.

title: Vance breaks down his viral ‘Jim Halpert’ side-smirk moment at VP debate
content: Ohio Senator JD Vance's frequent glances at the camera during the vice presidential debate sparked viral comparisons to 'The Office' character Jim Halpert, despite Vance's claims of unintentionality. Despite his admitted nervousness, he felt affirmed by his wife's positive reaction following the debate.
summary: Ohio Senator JD Vance's frequent glances at the camera during the vice presidential debate sparked viral comparisons to 'The Office' character Jim Halpert, despite Vance's claims of unintentionality. Despite his admitted nervousness, he felt affirmed by his wife's positive reaction following the debate.

title: 'Trump most dangerous candidate': Bruce Springsteen joins celebrity list backing Kamala Harris
content: Bruce Springsteen publicly endorses Kamala Harris for the upcoming presidential election, emphasizing the dangers posed by her opponent, Donald Trump. Springsteen's support follows endorsements from other prominent celebrities, reflecting widespread backing from Hollywood for Harris and her running mate, Tim Walz.
summary: Bruce Springsteen publicly endorses Kamala Harris for the upcoming presidential election, emphasizing the dangers posed by her opponent, Donald Trump. Springsteen's support follows endorsements from other prominent celebrities, reflecting widespread backing from Hollywood for Harris and her running mate, Tim Walz.

title: MrBeast discloses secret plan to keep uploading videos after death
content: YouTube’s biggest star, MrBeast, disclosed on Logan Paul's podcast that he has pre-recorded 15 videos to be uploaded posthumously. Although he admits the content is subpar, the intention is to keep his channel active after his death. With 318 million subscribers, MrBeast aims to continue surprising his audience even beyond his lifetime.
summary: YouTube’s biggest star, MrBeast, disclosed on Logan Paul's podcast that he has pre-recorded 15 videos to be uploaded posthumously. Although he admits the content is subpar, the intention is to keep his channel active after his death. With 318 million subscribers, MrBeast aims to continue surprising his audience even beyond his lifetime.

title: US dock workers end strike after 3 days, reach agreement to boost wages by 62%
content: Longshore workers in the U.S. end a major work stoppage with a new agreement including a 62% wage hike over six years, raising hourly wages to $63. The strike, affecting 45,000 workers, halted operations at 36 ports and caused significant supply disruptions. The contract extends until January 2025 to address remaining issues.
summary: Longshore workers in the U.S. end a major work stoppage with a new agreement including a 62% wage hike over six years, raising hourly wages to $63. The strike, affecting 45,000 workers, halted operations at 36 ports and caused significant supply disruptions. The contract extends until January 2025 to address remaining issues.

title: 'Worst is yet to come’: Living ‘Nostradamus’ warned of Middle East conflict—and it’s happening
content: Brazilian psychic Athos Salomé warned of escalating conflict between Israel and Iran, predicting a global crisis. He highlighted the potential role of AI and electromagnetic pulse attacks in future hostilities. Salomé foresees geopolitical strife spreading beyond the Middle East, destabilizing the world.
summary: Brazilian psychic Athos Salomé warned of escalating conflict between Israel and Iran, predicting a global crisis. He highlighted the potential role of AI and electromagnetic pulse attacks in future hostilities. Salomé foresees geopolitical strife spreading beyond the Middle East, destabilizing the world.

title: 'Diabolically smart tbh': Elon Musk accuses Democrats of flipping swing states with illegal immigration
content: Elon Musk accused the Democratic Party of intentionally increasing illegal immigration to swing states for voter importation, fast-tracking migrants to citizenship. He shared data highlighting significant rises in illegal immigrant populations in key states since 2021, criticising the Biden administration's immigration policies.
summary: Elon Musk accused the Democratic Party of intentionally increasing illegal immigration to swing states for voter importation, fast-tracking migrants to citizenship. He shared data highlighting significant rises in illegal immigrant populations in key states since 2021, criticising the Biden administration's immigration policies.

title: Outrage in SA over farmers accused of feeding slain black women to pigs
content: Two black women seeking discarded food on a white-owned farm in Limpopo Province were fatally shot, and their decomposed bodies were found in a pigsty, igniting debates over race, gender-based violence, and land tensions in South Africa. The accused include the farm owner, a supervisor, and a worker.
summary: Two black women seeking discarded food on a white-owned farm in Limpopo Province were fatally shot, and their decomposed bodies were found in a pigsty, igniting debates over race, gender-based violence, and land tensions in South Africa. The accused include the farm owner, a supervisor, and a worker.

title: Top Republican urges Biden to rush 2,000-pound bombs to Israel held up over human rights concerns
content: US Representative Michael McCaul urges President Biden to expedite delayed 2,000-pound bomb shipments to Israel due to rising regional tensions and threats from Hamas and Hezbollah. The shipments have been stalled due to human rights concerns over civilian casualties in Gaza. Biden administration's response remains pending.
summary: US Representative Michael McCaul urges President Biden to expedite delayed 2,000-pound bomb shipments to Israel due to rising regional tensions and threats from Hamas and Hezbollah. The shipments have been stalled due to human rights concerns over civilian casualties in Gaza. Biden administration's response remains pending.

title: Bangladesh's Hindus mull cancelling Durga Puja amid security concerns
content: Amid security concerns, Bangladesh's Hindu community might cancel Durga Puja festivities this year despite extra measures by the government. Anonymous letters demanding payment as 'tax' and threats to temples have heightened fears. Police are investigating, with regular patrols underway to ensure safety during the festival season.
summary: Amid security concerns, Bangladesh's Hindu community might cancel Durga Puja festivities this year despite extra measures by the government. Anonymous letters demanding payment as 'tax' and threats to temples have heightened fears. Police are investigating, with regular patrols underway to ensure safety during the festival season.

title: GOP Congressman faces backlash over 2006 blackface photos, claims it was 'homage to Michael Jackson'
content: New York Congressman Mike Lawler faces backlash after photos emerged of him in blackface at a 2006 Halloween party, dressed as Michael Jackson. Despite claiming it was a tribute to his hero, Lawler’s actions are criticized as racially insensitive. The controversy arises as Lawler prepares for a tough re-election battle.
summary: New York Congressman Mike Lawler faces backlash after photos emerged of him in blackface at a 2006 Halloween party, dressed as Michael Jackson. Despite claiming it was a tribute to his hero, Lawler’s actions are criticized as racially insensitive. The controversy arises as Lawler prepares for a tough re-election battle.

title: Melania Trump claims 2018 "I don’t care" jacket was directed at media , not linked to migrants
content: Melania Trump clarifies in her memoir that her 2018 'I really don't care, do u?' jacket was aimed at the media, not related to migrant children. She criticizes the media's focus on her $39 jacket, arguing it detracted from important border issues. Her former press secretary had discouraged her from explaining the jacket’s intent.
summary: Melania Trump clarifies in her memoir that her 2018 'I really don't care, do u?' jacket was aimed at the media, not related to migrant children. She criticizes the media's focus on her $39 jacket, arguing it detracted from important border issues. Her former press secretary had discouraged her from explaining the jacket’s intent.

title: Taiwan slowly returns back to work after Typhoon Krathon receded
content: Typhoon Krathon caused significant damage in Southern Taiwan, flooding streets and breaking windows in Kaohsiung. Local governments declared continue repair efforts, as the storm downgraded to a tropical depression. Power outages persist for 100,000 households, while two deaths and 667 injuries have been reported. Transportation, including flights and rail services, remains disrupted.
summary: Typhoon Krathon caused significant damage in Southern Taiwan, flooding streets and breaking windows in Kaohsiung. Local governments declared continue repair efforts, as the storm downgraded to a tropical depression. Power outages persist for 100,000 households, while two deaths and 667 injuries have been reported. Transportation, including flights and rail services, remains disrupted.

title: TikTok influencer 'Mr Prada 456' accused of killing therapist, blood found in apartment
content: TikTok star Terryon Thomas, with 3.9 million followers, is charged with second-degree murder and obstruction of justice after the blood of Louisiana therapist William Nicholas Abraham was found in his apartment. Abraham's body was discovered on a highway, with evidence pointing to a violent altercation.
summary: TikTok star Terryon Thomas, with 3.9 million followers, is charged with second-degree murder and obstruction of justice after the blood of Louisiana therapist William Nicholas Abraham was found in his apartment. Abraham's body was discovered on a highway, with evidence pointing to a violent altercation.

title: 'People who worked closely with Diddy terrified, losing sleep'
content: Many Hollywood A listers partied with Diddy but that does not mean they were complicit in the trafficking that Diddy did. The celebrities, a report said, used to leave by the time the parties used to get wilder and many with whom Diddy's photos are going viral may not have anything to do with the charges. Universal Music Group CEO Sir Lucian Grainge protested the "offensively false" claims that they "aided and abetted" Combs.
summary: Many Hollywood A listers partied with Diddy but that does not mean they were complicit in the trafficking that Diddy did. The celebrities, a report said, used to leave by the time the parties used to get wilder and many with whom Diddy's photos are going viral may not have anything to do with the charges. Universal Music Group CEO Sir Lucian Grainge protested the "offensively false" claims that they "aided and abetted" Combs.

title: Colorado clerk sentenced to 9 years for voting system breach tied to election conspiracy
content: Tina Peters, ex-Mesa County clerk, received a nine-year prison sentence for her role in breaching the county's voting system and promoting 2020 election conspiracy theories. Judge Matthew Barrett emphasized her defiance, denying probation. Peters had been convicted on multiple charges, including attempting to influence a public servant and unauthorized system access using another's security badge.
summary: Tina Peters, ex-Mesa County clerk, received a nine-year prison sentence for her role in breaching the county's voting system and promoting 2020 election conspiracy theories. Judge Matthew Barrett emphasized her defiance, denying probation. Peters had been convicted on multiple charges, including attempting to influence a public servant and unauthorized system access using another's security badge.

title: Kamala Harris' husband denies slapping ex-girlfriend: 'Any suggestion....untrue'
content: After a studied silence for a day, the spokesperson of Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff confirmed to Semafor that the report of Kamala Harris' husband slapping his girlfriend in 2012 is untrue. In a statement to Semafor, a spokesperson for Emhoff said “this report is untrue,” and that “any suggestion that he would or has ever hit a woman is false.”
summary: After a studied silence for a day, the spokesperson of Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff confirmed to Semafor that the report of Kamala Harris' husband slapping his girlfriend in 2012 is untrue. In a statement to Semafor, a spokesperson for Emhoff said “this report is untrue,” and that “any suggestion that he would or has ever hit a woman is false.”
